src:
Jadwal Liga Champions Kamis Dinihari: PSG, Man City, Bayern
06 Nov 2019, 03:42 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jadwal Liga Champions pekan keempat pada Kamis dinihari, 7 November 2019, antara lain akan menyajikan aksi Manchester City, Bayern Munchen, dan Paris Saint-Germain. Mereka berpeluang lolos pada pekan ini.
Peluang lolos terbesar dimiliki PSG. Klub Prancis itu kini memuncaki klasemen Grup A dengan nilai 9 dari 3 laga, unggul 5 poin dari Real Madrid di posisi kedua. PSG juga sudah unggul 7 poin dari Club Brugge (Belgia), tim urutan tiga yang akan jadi lawannya pekan ini.
PSG akan lolos bila bisa menang atas Brugge. Nantinya, kemenangan itu akan membuat mereka unggul 10 poin dari lawannya itu, sehingga tak mungkin dikejar dalam dua laga tersisa.
Bayern Munchen juga berpelung lolos dari Grup B. Tim itu berada di puncak dengan nilai 9, diikuti Tottenham Hotspur (4) dan Red Star Belgrade (3).
Bayern, yang baru memecat pelatih Niko Kovac, akan menghadapi Olympiakos. Tim Budesliga akan bisa lolos bila bisa memenangi pertandingan kandang tersebut.
Dari Grup C, Manchester City juga berpeluang lolos. Tim Liga Inggris itu memuncaki klasemen dengan nilai 9, unggul 5 poin dari Dinamo Zagreb dan Shakthar Donetsk.
Manchester City akan mampu lolos bila menang atas Atalanta, terlepas dari hasil Dinamo Zagreb vs Shakthar Donetsk.
Jadwal Liga Champions pekan keempat

text:
Thursday Morning Champions League Schedule: PSG, Man City, Bayern
Nov 6 2019, 03:42 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Champions League schedule for the fourth week on Thursday morning, 7 November 2019, will present, among others, the actions of Manchester City, Bayern Munich and Paris Saint-Germain. They have the chance to escape this week.
The biggest escape opportunity is owned by PSG. The French club now top the Group A standings with 9 from 3 matches, 5 points ahead of Real Madrid in second place. PSG are also 7 points ahead of Club Brugge (Belgium), the third-placed team to be their opponents this week.
PSG will qualify if they can win over Brugge. Later, the victory will make them 10 points ahead of his opponent, so it is impossible to be pursued in the remaining two matches.
Bayern Munich are also likely to qualify from Group B. The team is top with 9 points, followed by Tottenham Hotspur (4) and Red Star Belgrade (3).
Bayern, who recently sacked coach Niko Kovac, will face Olympiakos. The Budesliga team will be able to qualify if they can win the home match.
From Group C, Manchester City is also likely to escape. The Premier League team topped the standings with 9 points, 5 points ahead of Dinamo Zagreb and Shakthar Donetsk.
Manchester City will be able to qualify if they win over Atalanta, regardless of the results of Dinamo Zagreb vs Shakthar Donetsk.
Champions League schedule for the fourth week
Thursday, November 7, 2019 Munchen vs Olympiakos | 00:55 WIB Moscow vs Juventus | 00:55 WIB (SCTV) PSG vs Club Brugge | 03:00 WIB Real Madrid vs Galatasaray | 03:00 WIB (SCTV) Red Star Belgrade vs Tottenham | 03:00 WIB Dinamo Zagreb vs Shakhtar Donetsk | 03:00 WIBAtalanta vs Manchester City | 03:00 WIBLeverkusen vs Atletico Madrid | 3:00 a.m.
